text: Adolfo Ibáñez Boggiano (born 1980 - died 1949) was a Chilean businessman. He was the founder of the companies Compañía Comercial e Industrial Tres Montes S.A. (now Tresmontes Lucchetti) and Sociedad Comercial de Almacenes Ltda. (now Walmart Chile). Category:1880 births Category:1949 deaths Category:Chilean businesspeople Category:People from Parral
title: Adolfo Ibáñez Boggiano
